file.title: Screen Shot

p.text: The command shots the screen and saves the picture into clipboard (a place that stores everytning you copy and insert).

p.textAll: The image is also saved as a temporary file which can be assigned as the image of some object (e.g. background image of a window).

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how main window background images can be set:
sample.samplecode: Window1.Window1.Background image = "C:/1.bmp" Window1.Window1.Background image = "/1.bmp" Window1.Window1.Background image = My documents & "/2.jpg" Window1.Window1.Background image = Window1.Button1.Background image
